name: analysis_spec
title: Quality control of sequencing data
description:
# Purpose 
 This analysis takes as input a sample information sheet and sequence data.
It creates an agrregated fastqc report of the dataset and a new merged, improved  dataset if the input was paired end.
It optionally applies trimming before merging reads.
# Parameters 
 Input : 
 1. Sample information as a text file
 2. Sequence data as a fastq or gzipped fastq file.
# Results 
This analysis produces 
 1. MultiQC report - an aggregate fastqc report of the input dataset.
 
2. Creates a new merged improved dataset after applying trimming if specified.
